response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("Age", "low", "20-year-old is younger, less likely to reoffend"),
    ("Gender", "medium", "Male has a higher recidivism rate than female"),
    ("Race/Ethnicity", "low", "Asian/Pacific Islander typically has lower recidivism rates"),
    ("Height & Weight", "low", "No significant impact on recidivism"),
    ("Marital Status", "medium", "Never married, may lack stability and support"),
    ("Living Arrangement", "medium", "Living alone may indicate lack of social support"),
    ("Education", "low", "Enrolled in college indicates engagement in positive activities"),
    ("Employment", "high", "No job in the past year increases likelihood of reoffending"),
    ("Drug Use (Past 4 Years)", "medium", "Marijuana use is a risk factor but less severe than harder drugs"),
    ("Depression (Past Month)", "high", "Feeling down in the dumps frequently indicates mental health issues that can increase recidivism"),
    ("Family Structure (Growing Up)", "low", "Living with both biological parents reduces risk of future criminal behavior"),
    ("Household Size (Growing Up)", "low", "No significant impact on recidivism"),
    ("Residential Area (Growing Up)", "medium", "Urban area may have increased exposure to crime and negative influences"),
    ("Belief in God", "low", "Lack of religious belief does not significantly impact recidivism"),
    ("Criminal History (Arrests)", "high", "1 arrest indicates a higher likelihood of reoffending"),
    ("Criminal History (Convictions)", "very high", "Conviction indicates a strong likelihood of reoffending")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as Asian / Pacific Islander. He has been arrested 1 time and has been convicted. He is 5 feet 10 inches and weighs 145 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is enrolled in a 4-year college. He has held no jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 4, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
